channel.title: Gargantua Glitch
channel.description:
So I got up to just before the power up Chapter of the game, and right as Gargantua comes into play killing off the military, Now what happened was I let him do his thang and kill the insensitive pricks, and well he came right up to the door of the hallway I was waiting in, shot his blue ray of death, then just stood there, and wouldn't move, i could attack him, shoot him ect, to no avail ofcourse, here is a screenshot of me up close with him
![](upload://7nUjISdOcJDx9YFHUudmbLs0v5b.jpeg)
And here is one about 5 seconds later after me hitting him and scrolling through my weapons again
![](upload://9h3R5LtZBlE2fGVRQOVYU9u83PJ.jpeg)
I Will admit, whilst it was AMAZING! that he stood there so I could near Jizz over the detail and amazingness of him, It was rather hard moving further through the game with him just chilling right in my way :slight_smile:

Same thing happened to me! I wasn’t sure if it was a bug, if I stood at certain angles then he attacked. He went back to wondering around when I moved back far enough, but as soon as I got close he came straight towards me.

Epic graphics though
